column4: is there a way to keep the audio from going out of sync in streaming video with mplayer?
really?  wow, I was just shooting in the dark, thanks
man mplayer will show alot of cool stuff
bugged me till i dived into the man page one booring day
do I just click on the streaming video itself and hit those keys (don't want to get mixed up with firefox hot-keys just in case)
groovey, didn't think the plugin would be helped by the man page
let me know  if it works
oh, well, that's how I get my streaming video.  the audio is in sync from the beginning, but then the video starts going ahead of it
oh, it's not mplayer, it's flash player 7, and flash doesn't seem to ever work very good on ubuntu
